alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 12:16PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chickasaw, southeastern Union, eastern Pontotoc, western Itawamba, Lee and western Monroe Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ecru to near Houston to near Maben. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Pontotoc, Aberdeen, Houston, Verona, Okolona, Trace State Park, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Shannon, Plantersville, Ecru, Prairie, New Harmony, Pratts Friendship, Troy, New Wren, Trebloc and Furrs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc; Union
